page.title: 07EDUCATION - PENALLT
page.content: A{GWENT VILLAGE SCHOOL}WITH 20 PUPILS {A TYPICAL DAY 7.00 Get up. Play with video game. 7.20 Go downstairs.Watch cartoons on video or play. 8.00 Wake Mum to make cereals (Weetabix and Readybrek).Wash.Brush teeth.Comb hair. 8.45 Leave for school. 9.00 School begins.Prayers and story.Conversation. 9.30 Mathematics/Computer/Mental Arithmetic. 10.30 Playtime.10.45 English,Computer Story writing.l2.00 Lunch and playtime We play football, tag, hide and seek 13.00 Reading. Depending on which day it is we do History, Geography, Science, Swimming or Art and Craft. 14.30 Playtime 14.45 Singing, Story l5.3O School end. 16.00 Watch T.V or play outside.l7.00 Teatime.20.00 Bed.
